Execution of known cloud discovery tools.Action: Monitor Windows Event ID 4688 for process creations matching known cloud discovery tool names or command-line arguments (e.g., involving AWS, Azure, GCP SDK commands, 'pacu', 'stormspotter'). Use frequency analysis to identify hosts running such commands unusually often.

Anomalous network traffic patterns indic.Action: Analyze Zeek conn.log and http.log for connection patterns to cloud provider endpoints (AWS, Azure, GCP IPs/domains). Identify hosts/users initiating an unusually high volume of connections to various cloud services or APIs in a short period. Use statistical methods like entropy measures or correlation analysis to identify communication patterns atypical for the environment, suggesting enumeration.
